sentence: Matt Fitzpatrick The second trend indicates that over 90% of players in four of the last five Masters (not including 2020) who finished in a share of 10th place or better following the first round posted an even better score in Round 2, 3 or 4.
author: Content Partner
title: BetMGM Golf: Masters Live Betting 2022: Trends To Know
